    Buckets
    
     AlwaysYes, you’d make an A grade support worker. You have all the necessary skills to become a caring and compassionate individual in the healthcare sector. Find out more about the importance of support workers by clicking the link above 
     SometimesYou’re almost there! You show some really great personal traits that indicate that you have the potential to be a good support worker. To find out how you can hone your skills, click the link above
     Don't knowYou may not be quite suitable for a career within the support workforce, however you can certainly learn what it takes. Find out more information by clicking the link above
     NeverWe’re sorry to say that maybe the support workforce isn’t quite right for you. However, should you wish to read more about what you’ll need in order to work in the healthcare sector, please visit the link above
webTitle: Would you be a good healthcare support worker? Quiz
